# mautrix-whatsapp
[](#mautrix-whatsapp)
A Matrix-WhatsApp puppeting bridge based on [whatsmeow](https://github.com/tulir/whatsmeow).
## Documentation
[](#documentation)
All setup and usage instructions are located on [docs.mau.fi](https://docs.mau.fi/bridges/go/whatsapp/index.html). Some quick links:
-   [Bridge setup](https://docs.mau.fi/bridges/go/setup.html?bridge=whatsapp) (or [with Docker](https://docs.mau.fi/bridges/general/docker-setup.html?bridge=whatsapp))
-   Basic usage: [Authentication](https://docs.mau.fi/bridges/go/whatsapp/authentication.html)
### Features & Roadmap
[](#features--roadmap)
[ROADMAP.md](https://github.com/mautrix/whatsapp/blob/main/ROADMAP.md) contains a general overview of what is supported by the bridge.
## Discussion
[](#discussion)
Matrix room: [#whatsapp:maunium.net](https://matrix.to/#/#whatsapp:maunium.net)
## About
A Matrix-WhatsApp puppeting bridge
[maunium.net/go/mautrix-whatsapp](https://maunium.net/go/mautrix-whatsapp "https://maunium.net/go/mautrix-whatsapp")

[go](https://github.com/topics/go "Topic: go") [golang](https://github.com/topics/golang "Topic: golang") [matrix](https://github.com/topics/matrix "Topic: matrix") [bridge](https://github.com/topics/bridge "Topic: bridge") [whatsapp](https://github.com/topics/whatsapp "Topic: whatsapp") [whatsapp-web](https://github.com/topics/whatsapp-web "Topic: whatsapp-web") [matrix-appservice](https://github.com/topics/matrix-appservice "Topic: matrix-appservice") [matrix-org](https://github.com/topics/matrix-org "Topic: matrix-org")
